name: Satire is Dead: So Lets Play Ball
name_original: Satire is Dead: So Lets Play Ball
description:
LETS PLAY BALLS!!!

Hey people, it me, SpaceBaby.

Hope you all enjoy this quirky little ball game demo, my first ever experiment with 3D. 

Dev Stuff:

So this game was made in about a week, using only custom made assets the whole time from the scripts to the texture materials. Overall, however, this was more of a way for me to explore Unity3D, its physics engine and having a hand at creating my own raycasting detection system for object.

Honestly, the hardest part of all of this was the character controller which took about two and a half days in total to actually get something that felt fun and dynamic enough for a sports game (one of the biggest similarities I've noticed jumping from 2D to 3D).

I would love some feedback if you have any and any comments good or bad will only make my future content stronger.
